templates.name: Do you offer team/group discounts?
templates.content: You can learn more about our team discounts at the following link: https://www.tailactivewear.com/pages/teams

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.tailactivewear.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at sales@tailactivewear.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Can I return a final sale item?
templates.content: Please note that items indicated as "Final Sale" at the time of purchase are not eligible for a return, exchange, or merchandise credit. Final Sale will be noted in red directly under the product name.

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: All orders are fulfilled by our warehouse located in Florida.

templates.name: Do you offer price adjustments?
templates.content:
We offer a one-time price adjustment if an item is marked down within 7 days of your order date. Items purchased using a promotion code or other discount aren't eligible for a price adjustment unless you used only a free shipping discount. "Final sale" items are not eligible for a price adjustment as well.

To get a price adjustment, please email us within 7 days of your order date at web@tailactivewear.com or give us a call at 1-888-906-1341. Make sure that you have your order number ready when you call or email. If your purchase is eligible for a price adjustment, we refund you the difference in your original form of payment.

templates.name: Damaged/incorrect items
templates.content: We're so sorry to hear your order arrived in less than perfect condition! In the unlikely event that you have received an item that is damaged or incorrect, please process the exchange or return through our returns site: https://returns.tailactivewear.com/ Please make note that the item was damaged upon receipt. You can also email us at web@tailactivewear.com and we will work with you to arrange a return, replacement or refund.

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/tailactivewear/?hl=enand FB here: https://www.facebook.com/tailactivewear/

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://www.tailactivewear.com/apps/redo/returns-portal#/login

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! I'd recommend taking a look at our size chart here: https://www.tailactivewear.com/pages/size-chart Please note that if you are in-between sizes, you may prefer the next size larger. If you're still unsure, just ler me know!

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://www.tailactivewear.com/apps/store-locator/

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at web@tailactivewear.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://www.tailactivewear.com/pages/tail-rewards

templates.name: Cancel edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.tailactivewear.com/pages/shipping-returns

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-888-906-1341 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $150. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at web@tailactivewear.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 2 business days and we usually ship via UPS. Once shipped it will take 2-7 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Do golf dresses come with shorts?
templates.content: Most of our golf dresses do come with shorties, and this is noted in the features section on each product page.

templates.name: Can I use a discount code along with the Free Shipping code?
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at web@tailactivewear.com or give us a call at +1-888-906-1341. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: What happened to your memebership?
templates.content: I'm afraid we have discontinued the membership program indefinitely.

templates.name: Size Chart: Women - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our women's size chart here: https://www.tailactivewear.com/pages/size-chart

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.tailactivewear.com/collections/sale
